item.title: Japanese Space Agency
item.description: Today, a lecture took place for MIRAI alumni took place on the history and activities of the Japanese Space Agency.

item.title: Lecture on the Making of Japanese Swords
item.description: Last week, the Online Visiting program for 2023-2024 MIRAI participants started.

item.title: Lecture on Japan's carbon policy
item.description: Today, a lecture on Japan’s carbon policies took place as part of the MIRAI program.

item.title: Lecture on the evolution of manga
item.description: Last saturday a MIRAI alumni event took place, consisting in a lecture on the evolution of graphic arts in Japan by professor Atsushi Hosogaya from the Tokyo Polytechnic University.

item.title: Hatsu-zoomu
item.description: Participants in the Science and Technology Group On this saturday the 15th of january took place the first meeting among participants of the MIRAI program; which fosters the relations among Japan and Europe through a short exchange between students of both regions.
